website_summaries.verdict: A nice deal for an iconic dinosaur is made even better due to the great articulation and engaging fighting features built into the Jurassic World stegosaurus.
pros: Press plates for head-butting and tail-swinging battle actions
cons: Plate buttons may make a clicking sound when pressed

customer_reviews.title: Jurassic World welcomes a new attraction!
customer_reviews.text: It’s big, it’s colorful, it’s got action features! With a press of a button you can flap its wings or snap its beak.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Get the original Suchomimus....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item 2 days ago and when i got it i noticed that the toy's biting action doesn't even work. So take my advice and get the original blue suchomimus.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fire Beak gets an Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: The figure is a must for any dinosaur lover or if you love Jurassic Park/World. The level of detail is gorgeous and the colors are very vivid. It is an upgrade from the harder to find Kenner figure; which will always have a special spot for nostalgic reasons... But I must say, Mattel is really bringing their all with these. It looks very accurate to the animal.. but could be bigger as the animal dwarfs sauropods. Highly recommend! It's only $19 bucks!! You can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Yami Huey

customer_reviews.title: Well done mattel
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed by not only the quantity of new releases this year but also the quality, looks good with simple to use action features this quetz is near perfect. My only complaint would be the mouth being wide open, wish it was the other way around so when you pressed the button it opens instead of closing but that's a minor gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Banana Gibson

customer_reviews.title: KING OF THE SKIES
customer_reviews.text: This pterosaur signifies the peak of animal's ability to conquer the skies. Upon receiving it, I can feel my charisma soar upwards much like how it takes off from the ground (with assistance from my hand). The first button of the dual attack feature allows the enormous murderbeak to swing downwards and destroy any dinosaur unfortunate enough to pass underneath its airspace, while the second button allows it to flap its glorious, mighty wings, keeping it in control of the atmosphere much as you control your life. I have named mine "Prehistorik Yumboyet". You should get one and name yours too.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Interesting paint job
customer_reviews.text: At first I hated this paint job, but for some reason once I had it in front of me I instantly loved it.
customer_reviews.author: KPM

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Issue Eye Registration Off
customer_reviews.text: Normally I would've loved this item but the quality control kept me from there. The eye registration is off on this item which ruins it for me. It would be easier to buy this locally if it was available to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Malone

customer_reviews.title: Jurassic World is the Gold standard
customer_reviews.text: If you want a GENUINE dinosaur toy than can take a toddler beating this is the one. Stegosaurus has always been my favorite and with the articulating tail and head this one is AWESOME. My kid has thrown this around the house and it still works fine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy, mine came broken
customer_reviews.text: This is probably just an issue with shipping or something but ours came broken - a small piece of plastic is cracked right under the left wing making the flying effect difficult to work. I pushed it in a bit but it looks like it may want to break off if I play with it more. Wings work better but not as intended. Probably a one off issue but that's what we got.
customer_reviews.author: John Preston

customer_reviews.title: 2 attacks, and fairly priced to comparable others
customer_reviews.text: For a Jurassic world toy this one is a great deal for the money. I paid 9.99 for a dual action toy. Which means this guy can attack in 2 different ways. Which for a kids toy that's original brand name is awesome. My 4 year old liked this toy and has enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can scan it with the app!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but it is BIG which is probably good but mine has a loose leg when I opened it and pressed The plate it’s leg slide forward but the tail swung it stand pretty well though Ps: im a 9-year old boy,i know what I’m talking about
customer_reviews.author: Dino collecter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but can't stand on it's own
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, however his eyes are a little wonky. (He's cross eyed) And he has a difficult time standing on his own. My other Mattel JW Dino's can stand by themselves, but this Suchomimus needs a little support. The package he comes in is sturdy, but oddly shaped. A little difficult to wrap. Strong and sturdy plastic. The paint stands up to lots of rough play.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp and pointy beak, dangerous toy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, colorful dinosaur, but the beak is EXTREMELY POINTY AND SHARP!! I had to return this for the fear that this beak will take out an eye. I am serious. Pretty dangerous for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rangers68

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: What a great Spinosaurus. My boys love it. There are two parts on the spine that you can press down to make the Dino move. Plastic is semi hard. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsy Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great dino
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaur came already assembled and great fun right out of the box. My son is obsessed with dinosaurs and this was one he hadn’t had. Very happen with the quality and movement of the head and tail. Very durable with play.
customer_reviews.author: nicola houston

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool dino for my 3.5 year old. It's a good size and it is packaged nicely for gifting. For $10, I am quite happy with this. We're saving it for xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice figure, stiff action mechanic.
customer_reviews.text: As a collector, I've been after this dinosaur for a while. The paint scheme (what seems to be mustard and brown) is odd, though nicely applied. The figure has 2 action features. By pushing down on different areas of the spine, you'll either trigger the tail to swipe or the head to lunge forward in a bite. In my figure, the head action works fine, but the tail is very stiff and is very hard to operate. Overall though, it's not a bad figure.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Even I love this one! I ordered a bunch of dinos for my son’s birthday and this was my favorite because of the size and features! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Love this dinosaur. He is pretty large, but he doesn't make noise (that's a plus for us). Easy to work by pushing a button on his back. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: MDMosh

customer_reviews.title: Funtastic dino!
customer_reviews.text: A really good toy for long neck dino enthusiasts! The button for the neck works fantastically , though the tails button doesn't really move the tail much . But my 4 year old doesn't care, she loves it! It came in original packaging and the dino was relatively easy to get out , woot!
customer_reviews.author: Emily anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really great figure a must have for any Jurassic World collection. Great sculpt and cool color scheme, dual attack function works nice.
customer_reviews.author: Donavon

customer_reviews.title: Big size, big fun
customer_reviews.text: Good dinosaur, big, nice size. Easy for little hands to play with. Pretty durable, nice quality, hours of fun
customer_reviews.author: S Riks

customer_reviews.title: New? A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not saying the toy isn't new but there are several blemishes and worn off paint spots as well as one leg isn't assembled correctly and spins around unlike the other 3 legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: True description
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew and he loved it. I was pleased when it came. It looked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too cool!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves jurassic world dinos. He received this for Christmas and it's one of his favorite dinos!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: My sons third favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My sons third favorite. A little unstable probably due to its moving parts or my sons roughness.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not soo happy with its functionality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is 7, the one we received was broken and the second replacement didn't work as well
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The leg keeps falling off and the tail doesn't even work. I was so disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a very sturdy toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old accidentally drop him once and his jaw broke. Not very durable
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great pick!
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited when we ordered this, it took a week... but when we got it he was so excited and hasn’t put it down!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson likes this one, although it isn’t as colorful as the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiju Loving Gma

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two days
customer_reviews.text: Got my son for Christmas, broke after a couple days. The button got stuck and mouth wouldn’t move. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Motherofdragonz

customer_reviews.title: My son will love it
customer_reviews.text: Gret dinosaur and great size. Thoughts it would end up being a small dinosaur. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy and it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Hermdagerm72

customer_reviews.title: Just a plastic doll
customer_reviews.text: As they were supposed to do... The advertisers made it seem a lot cooler than it actually was. It’s a plastic doll.
customer_reviews.author: lauristephenson

customer_reviews.title: Cute Dino!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to make the tail move & it would have been cool of it made noise
customer_reviews.author: NYAngela

customer_reviews.title: COLORFUL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT, ITS PERCHED ON MY L IVING ROOM LAMP.
customer_reviews.author: thekadydidkloset0197

customer_reviews.title: Cool unusual Dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved this dinosaur! He was so excited and looked up all the facts about him.
customer_reviews.author: bransj1

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the Jurassic world line of dinosaur toys! Nice and really good size.
customer_reviews.author: Maddison

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present but I know my son is going to love this! It came just as described and delivered on time!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great sauropod
customer_reviews.text: totally chap mei colours though, haha. also the spines were probably not covered in fins irl.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest son has been into dinosaurs since he was one to the point of knowing there real names. And he loves being able to have larger Dino’s in his collection that can be honestly played with by him, he’s six now without breaking them. I will definitely buy more from this collection!
customer_reviews.author: James Hanauska

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: Ordered back in late June and finally received it in September, but worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: Check the tail.
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy. Mine came with what appeared to be a manufacturers defect..... The last segment of the tail had a hairline crack from both sides of the spine, almost all the way around the tail. Would've sent it back for a swap, but my son threw a fit. Crazy glued it. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Snatched this up on Thanksgiving half off... 3 yr old Son loved it. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for ages 4+
customer_reviews.text: Once the tail broke off it didn't function properly again. Tail is easy to put back on but pushing on the spike to move the tail no longer worked.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amy, the dinosaur. . .
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice dinosaur toy! My daughter and I had a lot of fun playing tea party with it. It’s new name is Amy, the Amargosaurus. The play features work well and has no loose parts. Amy was ready for play as soon as the box was opened. I hope this review helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: My nephew nearly passed out when he saw this amazing Dino! Worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Another great Dino from Mattel’s JW line. My son loved the size, details, & everything else about it. So that’s a win.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We got what we paid for. I recommend this toy and the seller
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight!
customer_reviews.text: My son screamed his name as soon as he seen the snout! He loves this toy. Excellent addition to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Such a great toy!
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's favorite dinos. Well made and durable. The action buttons are a little harder to use compared to most if the other dinos but still a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Tail attack
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy. Only problem is the tail attack. It genuinely... Sucks. It hardly functions on mine, might be a product defect so know in advance it has a funky tail.
customer_reviews.author: stepehen chocsteclo

customer_reviews.title: Nice size good price
customer_reviews.text: Son almost has all dinosaurs now . This one is a good size
customer_reviews.author: Heather phipps

customer_reviews.title: When they arrived check if the action feature works because it could come in broken.Just a heads up
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It’s great if you have a kid who loves dinosaurs and you should also get the Mega Dual Attack Suchomimus aswell. Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: David.C

customer_reviews.title: It’s could come in broken from one of the action features
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great figure but mine came in broken and from the tail so I recommend to go buy it at a store because then you could try it out
customer_reviews.author: David.C

customer_reviews.title: Very easy transaction
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, great articulation, as advertised and arrived when promised.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy transaction

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: The toy is a gift for a birthday coming September 3, so I do not know how it will be received.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son for xmas he loves it and he plays with it everyday and has not broke yet

customer_reviews.title: Cool yellow dino!
customer_reviews.text: Great figure from Mattel's awesome Jurassic line. Nice sculpt and details. Love the bright color. Item came on time and in perfect condition.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this toy he was so excited when it arrived and I surprised him! Definitely worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After just a few months of playing with this toy. The front leg popped off and won’t go back on. Cheaply made for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for dino lovers.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, my sons love playing with it. Great for dino lovers.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing collectors item
customer_reviews.text: Glad i bought this at a great price, it's a nice figure to add to any dinosaur collection

customer_reviews.title: Great figure
customer_reviews.text: This is really detailed and my nephew loves it he says it's really great

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are hard to press
customer_reviews.text: The buttons on the spine are difficult to completely depress. It seems like there is binding in the internal workings.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is just as described. I know my Grandson will love it!😃

customer_reviews.title: Great dinosaur!

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly

customer_reviews.title: A stegosaurus for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Can't find this in stores. May be an exclusive? Idk. But, I love this dino! Love the Amazon pricing. Bought 2. One to open and 1 to keep in Package. Hopefully it'll be worth more money one day. :)
customer_reviews.author: BluYota

product_meta.title: Jurassic World MEGA Dual Attack Stegosaurus
product_meta.description: Style:StegosaurusExperience Jurassic World dinosaur battle play in a whole new way! Jurassic World Mega Dual Attack dinosaur action figures come in a larger size and have dual-button activation for fierce battle action! Push the two buttons on each dinosaur to activate different battle features, such as tail strikes, head strikes and massive chomps! You can also press both buttons at the same time for dual-striking action! These dinosaur action figures have movie-inspired sculpting, an articulated head and tail, authentic color and realistic texture. Recreate all the epic Jurassic World battle-action scenes with these Mega Dual Attack dinosaur action figures! Choose from Stegosaurus, Suchomimus, Quetzalcoatlus action figures and more (each sold separately, subject to availability). Each dinosaur comes with a cool Dino Rivals collector card detailing its key battle stats and attributes. For more dinosaur fun, download the Jurassic World Facts app (Android and iOS) to scan and watch each dinosaur come to life, learn attack facts, compare stats and more!
feature_bullets: Large action-scale dinosaur figure has two-button activation for both tail strike action and head strike action
Press both buttons for dual strike action at the same time!
Dinosaurs also feature movie-inspired sculpting and authentic color and detail
Movie-inspired sculpting and authentic color and detail

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,576 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
